mapper.sql:
SELECT a.* FROM user_details a
AND a.user_id = #{param.userId}
AND a.username LIKE ('%' || #{param.username} || '%')
AND a.nickname LIKE ('%' || #{param.nickname} || '%')
AND a.phone LIKE ('%' || #{param.phone} || '%')
AND a.email LIKE ('%' || #{param.email} || '%')
AND a.status = #{param.status}
AND a.create_time >= to_date(#{param.createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND a.create_time <= to_date(#{param.createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND a.update_time >= to_date(#{param.updateTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND a.update_time <= to_date(#{param.updateTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM user_details a LEFT JOIN user_role b on a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.role_id = #{roleId}
